title: "WATCH: Robot Nurses Have Made Their Way to San Angelo"
excerpt: "Shannon Medical Center announced Wednesday the launch of Moxi, a care team delivery robot in its nursing units. In partnership with Diligent Robotics, nurses and other care team members can now call on a pair of robots named Moxi to help them with their everyday tasks improving overall clinical flows and giving nurses back valuable time to maximize care for their patients."
